author: Jason Lemon
title: 97-Year-Old Woman in South Korea Fully Recovers From Coronavirus, Becomes Country's Oldest Surviving Patient
description: Several very elderly people, including centenarians in Iran and China, have recovered from the virus.
content:
A 97-year-old South Korean woman has fully recovered from the coronavirus, becoming the oldest person in the country to survive the infection.
South Korea's Yonhap News Agency reported on Thursday that officials said the elderly woman had left quarantine and… [+2629 chars]
